description: Why carry your heavy laptop with your travel? Buy our stamp size, 0.2oz SD card, store as many pictures as you want, and upload them to your computer only after you go back home. No need to worry about limitation of your digital camera! Free your travel bags, free your cameras, free your imagination!! High technology revolution! The qualified function provide you an ideal choice for both business and entertainment. This item is "Bulk" packaged. Comes with Protective Plastic Case only (No retail packaging).
title: SanDisk 2GB SD Memory Card (SDSDB-2048, Bulk Package)
